subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: David Ortiz hit two of Boston’s eight home runs in a 20-4 victory, while Jarrod Parker extended his unbeaten streak to 18 straight starts as Oakland beat Texas to move into a tie for first in the A.L. West.
snippet: David Ortiz hit two of Boston’s eight home runs in a 20-4 victory, while Jarrod Parker extended his unbeaten streak to 18 straight starts as Oakland beat Texas to move into a tie for first in the A.L. West.
